text: KBBQ-FM (102.7 The Vibe) is a commercial Top 40 radio station located in Van Buren, Arkansas, broadcasting to the Fort Smith, Arkansas, area on 102.7 FM. ==External links== *Station Website BBQ Category:Rhythmic contemporary radio stations in the United States Category:Radio stations established in 1982 Category:Cumulus Media radio stations Category:1982 establishments in Arkansas
title: KBBQ-FM
